content:
From: Lawrence Paulson via isabelle-dev <isabelle-dev@mailman.proof.cit.tum.de>
The repository seems to be inaccessible at the moment, at least to me
Larry

From: Fabian Huch <huch@in.tum.de>
The https version of the TUM repository is, sadly, regularly not
reachable due to AI crawlers. The SSH version is sometimes slow but
should work. For web access, you can use the Phorge instance on
sketis.net [1] (which is login-protected to avoid this problem), or the
raw repository view [2].

Fabian

[1]: https://isabelle-dev.sketis.net/repos/isabelle

[2]: https://isabelle.sketis.net/repos/isabelle/

On 8/6/25 12:14, Lawrence Paulson via isabelle-dev wrote:

The repository seems to be inaccessible at the moment, at least to me
Larry
